data.title: 3 Tech Stocks for Dividend Investors to Buy Amid Yield Curve & Trade Fears
data.text: Check out these 3 dividend paying tech stocks to buy as yield curve and trade war fears heat up.

data.title: Microsoft Stock Is in Watch Mode, Not Panic Mode
data.text: The Dow Jones experienced its worst day of 2019, which has negatively impacted most publicly traded companies, including MSFT stock. However, there are enough positives to warrant caution, not panic.

data.title: The Real Secret To Microsoft's Success
data.text: Microsoft is no longer in the raw experimentation stage common to young and growing companies. Rather, its main goal is to create profitability streams, then maintain and expand them.

data.title: Microsoft tweaks privacy policy to admit humans can listen to Skype Translator and Cortana audio
data.text: Microsoft is the latest tech giant to amend its privacy policy after media reports revealed it uses human contractors to review audio recordings of Skype and Cortana users. A section in the policy on how the company uses personal data now reads (emphasis ours): Our processing of personal data for these purposes includes both automated […]
